title: SMAAAASH!
comment: I just got done beating Earthbound on the WiiU Virtual Console, and was pleased to see that I can use the trippy backgrounds from the battle scenes as wallpaper. No lag and plenty of options to choose from. Everything from Runaway Dogs to the final battle with Giygas is here. Truly a great app for an Earthbound fan.

title: Awesome!

title: Amazing!
comment: This is a FANTASTIC app. I bought this because I'm a huge Earthbound fan,  but I ended up just using the backgrounds without the enemies because they are beautiful. What is even better is that every time you exit and app and revisit the Home screen the moving background changes.  This makes the app a game of Roulette, and with every background being awesome, you'll never be disappointed. I will be using this Live wallpaper for a loooong time.

title: Absolutely perfect
comment: It's amazing that something as simple as a live wallpaper can demonstrate such love for the source material, and the developer has definitely accomplished that here. He could have just randomized the enemy sprites and background combinations, but instead he took the time to pair each enemy with the actual background used in fights with them. This is hands down the best live wallpaper I've ever found.

title: Best update ever!!!
comment: Thanks so much buddy. This update made me so happy. Before I had to select only certain backgrounds and no enemies appeared. Now everything is working perfectly. You are a mad genius!!!   I just hope there's a donation button somewhere. I tried another background like yours before (remaining nameless). Paid a buck and nothing worked. So I refunded. Now I'm putting that dollar where it belongs!!!!
